tool_description: Formats scripture passages and references according to various academic and religious citation styles.

references.description: Citation references corresponding to each passage

citation_style.description: Citation format: APA, MLA, Chicago, SBL, or Traditional

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: Passages and references arrays must have the same length.
Invalid citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, SBL, Traditional].
Empty passages: All passages must contain text content.
Invalid references: Provide valid scripture references for all passages.
usage: Provide equal-length arrays of passages and references; optionally specify citation_style and include_translation_info. Returns properly formatted citations.

formatted_citations.description: Properly formatted citations for each passage
